name: tmexchange
description: tmx2js and js2tmx converter tmx utils

scripts.compile: rm -rf cjs && mkdir cjs && babel lib -d cjs --presets=@babel/preset-env --plugins=add-module-exports && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json
scripts.browser: browserify --standalone tmexchange cjs/index.js -o tmexchange.js && uglifyjs tmexchange.js --compress --mangle -o tmexchange.min.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && mocha test -R spec
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push

author: adrai
